thread.title: Richard
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Richard

author: Richard
title: Richard
text: Timothy was the biggest help upon our furniture selection as he knew everything in the store from alpha to omega. Very professional, funny, and all over awesome sales associate. To mention he was also patient with our 2 and a half hour stay. I would definitely recommend anybody towards him if they are confused on their furniture selections or needs.
